name: Lexy
description: Lexy, while browsing different yard sales, comes across a disc copy of the computer game "SpongeBob SquarePants: Operation Krabby Patty", being strangely drawn to it (Whether it was curiosity, or something else...). Later that night, they decide to check out the game, only for weird things to occur when the disc is inserted into the computer. When booting up the game, she passes out, only to awaken inside her computer, accompanied by an old friend. It's up to her to fix whatever that game did to her computer, and be freed from that digital hell.
